p.s: In the following I will comment on necessary as well as feasible measures to help solving the global pollution.
Every single human being knows that the enviromentalenvironmental pollution is increasing and it is becoming dangerous for human health, as well as for animals and plants.
The question is, what can we do to help?
Firstly, it can be said that everyone has to seperateseparate their trash.
Some people might say that it is not going to change anything but if everyone works together it is going to have a huge impact.
Secondly, we should start using sustainable and recycable products, for example clothes, and technical devices to prevent the pollution of the ocean and particular regions.
Lastly, people should start using electronical vehicles, (even if they are more expensive), so that the pollution of the air decreases and human health is not in big danger anymore.

All in all it can be said, that if everyone on planet earth starts by doing the bare minimum for our enviromentenvironment, the mass extinction of animals, plants and eventually humans can be stopped.
